name: serial-monitor
description: MCP Server for VS Code Serial Monitor - provides AI agents with serial communication tools

tools.name: serial_monitor_list_ports
tools.description: List all available serial ports with device information

tools.name: serial_monitor_connect
tools.description: Connect to a serial device on specified port

tools.name: serial_monitor_send
tools.description: Send data to connected serial device

tools.name: serial_monitor_read
tools.description: Read data from connected serial device

tools.name: serial_monitor_start_async
tools.description: Start background monitoring with pattern matching and timeout

tools.name: serial_monitor_check
tools.description: Check status of background watch tasks

tools.name: serial_monitor_session_info
tools.description: Get current session information and statistics
